title: 4.CYB.2
text: The student will identify and investigate best practices to safeguard information shared online and through online platforms.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Classify personal, private, and public information.
Research and evaluate tradeoffs of sharing information.
Investigate and communicate best practices to limit unauthorized access to information on a computing device.
Demonstrate proper use and protection of personal passwords.
List methods used to safeguard online information.
